RahulShettyAcademyPracticePagePage.description: This page is designed to provide a variety of interactive elements for practicing UI automation techniques. It includes examples of radio buttons, suggestion classes, dropdowns, checkboxes, window/tab handling, alerts, tables, and element display manipulation.

elements.name: Radio Button 1
elements.description: First radio button option.

elements.name: Suggestion Class Input
elements.description: Input field for suggestion class example.

elements.name: Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown select element.

elements.name: Checkbox Option 1
elements.description: First checkbox option.

elements.name: Open Window Button
elements.description: Button to open a new window.

elements.name: Open Tab Button
elements.description: Button to open a new tab.

elements.name: Alert Input
elements.description: Input field for the alert example.

elements.name: Alert Button
elements.description: Button to trigger an alert.

elements.name: Confirm Button
elements.description: Button to trigger a confirmation dialog.

elements.name: Hide Button
elements.description: Button to hide the associated textbox.

elements.name: Show Button
elements.description: Button to show the associated textbox.

elements.name: Hide/Show Example Textbox
elements.description: Textbox that can be hidden or shown.

assertions: Presence of 'Switch To Alert Example' section
